S06bsu053_u:5: ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhrakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ mahatā ca bodhisattvasaṃghena /
S06bsu053_u:6: tena khalu samayena bhagavān gambhīrāvasaṃbodhaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ /
S06bsu053_u:7: tena ca samayena āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caryāṃ caramāṇaḥ evaṃ vyavalokayati sma /
S06bsu053_u:9: athāyuṣmān śāriputro buddhānubhāvena āryāvalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvametadavocat - yaḥ kaścit kulaputro [vā kuladuhitā vā asyāṃ] gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caryāṃ cartukāmaḥ,
S06bsu053_u:11_0: evamukte āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat
S06bsu053_u:11_1: - yaḥ kaścicchāriputra kulaputro va kuladuhitā vā [asyāṃ] gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caryāṃ cartukāmaḥ,
S06bsu053_u:12: tenaivaṃ vyavalokitavyam - pañca skandhāṃstāṃśca svabhāvaśūnyān samanupaśyati sma /
S06bsu053_u:20: evaṃ śāriputra sarvadharmāḥ śūnyatālakṣaṇā anutpannā aniruddhā amalā vimalā anūnā asaṃpūrṇāḥ /
S06bsu053_u:26: na cakṣurna śrotraṃ na ghrāṇaṃ na jihvā na kāyo na mano na rūpaṃ na śabdo na gandho na raso na spraṣṭavyaṃ na dharmaḥ /
S06bsu053_u:28: na vidyā nāvidyā na kṣayo yāvanna jarāmaraṇaṃ na jarāmaraṇakṣayaḥ,
S06bsu053_u:29: na duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgā na jñānaṃ na prāptirnāprāptiḥ /
S06bsu053_u:34: tasmād jñātavyaḥ prajñāpāramitāmahāmantraḥ anuttaramantraḥ asamasamamantraḥ sarvaduḥkhapraśamanamantraḥ satyamamithyatvāt prajñāpāramitāyāmukto mantraḥ /
S06bsu053_u:35: tadyathā - gate gate pāragate pārasaṃgate bodhi svāhā /
S06bsu053_u:36: evaṃ śāriputra gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caryāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ bodhisattvena //
S06bsu053_u:37: atha khalu bhagavān tasmātsamādhervyutthāya āryāvalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu kulaputra /
S06bsu053_u:39: evametad gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caryaṃ cartavyaṃ yathā tvayā nirdiṣṭam /
S06bsu053_u:42: ānandamanā āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ āryāvalokiteśvaraśca bodhisattvaḥ sā ca sarvāvatī pariṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan //
